1. Researchers build AI-driven sarcasm detector  The Guardian
  2. An Algorithm To Detect Sarcasm? Like We Need That  IFLScience
  3. Neural network trained on 'Friends' can recognize sarcasm  Popular Science
  4. Sarcasm, notoriously difficult to interpret, demystified by multimodal approach  Tech Xplore
  5. Really? A sarcasm detector? Wow. You shouldn't have  The Register
